modShortDescription: This mod doubles the range that you can travel from your turret and keep it active/awake.
modDescription:
This mod doubles the range that you can travel from your [turret](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-traps/) and keep it active/awake.

* **Default Values**  
   * Level 0) Nothing: 10 Blocks  
   * Level 1) Science Projects: 14 Blocks  
   * Level 2) Basic Robotics: 15 Blocks  
   * Level 3) Automated Weaponry: 16 Blocks  
   * Level 4) Advanced Robotics: 17 Blocks  
   * Level 5) Robotics Expert: 18 Blocks
* **New Values**  
   * Level 0) Nothing: 20 Blocks  
   * Level 1) Science Projects: 28 Blocks  
   * Level 2) Basic Robotics: 30 Blocks  
   * Level 3) Automated Weaponry: 32 Blocks  
   * Level 4) Advanced Robotics: 34 Blocks  
   * Level 5) Robotics Expert: 36 Blocks

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1w3wogA2RLoFofSW5bLNPLs1420u3XtAn/view?usp=sharing)**
